extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
    This class represents an actor who is a researcher called Doctor Maybe

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        The overridden playTurn method returns a suitable Action for the DrMaybe object to perform. It calls the Distance class's isAdjacent method to check if the player is adjacent to it. It attacks the player if its adjacent to it. Else, it does nothing.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        A newly instantiated AttackAction if the player is adjacent to the DrMaybe object. Else, a newly instantiated SkipTurnAction.

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        Creates an intrinsic weapon which throws a conical flask. Uses Grunt class's static variable to get half of Grunt's damage.
        Overrides:
        getIntrinsicWeapon in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Returns:
        a newly instantiated IntrinsicWeapon
